name: 60 Second Rotation
description:
Speed & Rotate is a 2D puzzle game, so prepare yourself to play around and challenge to reach the other ball in time, but don’t rush and think so you will not lose your path. The game is designed to control the player's speed, rotation, with 60 seconds limitation to reach your end of the level. Players will need to solve the puzzle through one or more paths available to let them survive. Enjoy!

How to play: Your ball is green in color and the objective is blue color, on your keyboard hold "D" to rotate right and hold "A" to rotate left till 

Created by: Reza Ebrahimi - Mutaz Alshaer

Rules:?

Country: Slovenia
